name: nameday
title: Nameday
description: The most reliable way to know whos nameday it is today!
author: Borgund

commands.name: nameday
commands.title: nameday
commands.subtitle: Check whos nameday it is
commands.description: Checks todays namedays so you never have to wonder for long!

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
